name: Polyology
description: A colourful block pushing puzzle game with unique mechanics, a plethora of lovingly crafted levels and delightful soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 2.50 Ghz Dual-core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 512 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's a simple but good puzzle game where you have to push blocks, with some very good ideas to vary to concept. You should try it.
